result.purpose: This project is a simple Python application designed to print greeting messages to the console. It serves as an introductory example of basic Python scripting and console output.
result.architecture: Simple script-based architecture with a single entry point

root.purpose: Contains the main application logic for greeting messages
root.architecture: Simple script-based architecture with a single entry point

main.py.purpose: Prints a greeting message to the console
